DataElement.preferredName: Intratumoral Hemorrhage Imaging Procedure Visualized Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response to determine eligibility for clinical trial participation for questions related to intratumoral hemorrhage seen on an imaging procedure as outlined in the protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Intratumoral Hemorrhage Imaging Technique Visual Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Within a tumor._The flow of blood from a ruptured blood vessel._Any technology or method that aids in the visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for use in screening, diagnosis, surgical procedures or therapy._Relating to or using sight; able to be seen._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Within a tumor.:The flow of blood from a ruptured blood vessel.

Concepts.definition: The flow of blood from a ruptured blood vessel.

Property.preferredName: Imaging Technique Visual Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Any technology or method that aids in the visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for use in screening, diagnosis, surgical procedures or therapy.:Relating to or using sight; able to be seen.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: Any technology or method that aids in the visualization of any biological process, cell, tissue or organ for use in screening, diagnosis, surgical procedures or therapy.
Relating to or using sight; able to be seen.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: ACRIN:American College of Radiology Imaging Network

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does the patient have Intratu
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have Intratumoral hemorrhage (acute, subacute, or chronic) as seen on hemosiderin-sensitive (gradient-echo) MRI?
